/** * Since Version 1 * *

Get a row identified by its id. * *

note: need a call to the open() method before a call to this method. * * @param id id of the row to update * @return cursor object containing the row data. null object will be returned in case of errors. */ public Cursor getChargeById(long id) { if (!connectionOpen) return null; return db.query( OtokouChargeAdapter.TABLE_NAME, null, "" + OtokouChargeAdapter.COL_ID_NAME + "=" + id, null, null, null, null); }
